name: oleloBlogs
0:
”Alexa, open olelo Blogs”
”Choose blog Slam Online”
”Read the latest post”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: olelo blogs
des:
With olelo Blogs you can listen to different blogs. 

olelo Blogs provides access to blogs in different languages – so it might happen that the provided contents are not in English.

You can use the following commands:

Help
Choose blog <blog name>
Read the latest post
List posts
Read {Post}
Pause
Resume
Mark post as read
Use all posts
Use only unheard posts
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
